name: halka-boilerplate
description: Build System using NPM Scripts, Browserify and BrowserSync

scripts.watch:js: npm run build:js && watchify index.js -o web/src/bundle.js -v
scripts.build: npm run build:css & npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.start: npm run watch | npm run serve
